can/to be possible/to be able to/will/to be likely to/to be sure to/to assemble/to meet/to gather/to see/union/group/association/CL:個|个[ge4]/a moment (Taiwan pr. for this sense is [hui3])

sentences.english: You see a Quaker can flatter, but don't you be proud.
sentences.chinese: 你看，贵格会教徒也会奉承人了，但你可别翘尾巴呀。

sentences.english: Jacob Bohme; George Fox, founder of the Quakers; and Emanuel Swedenborg.
sentences.chinese: 雅各伯梅，贵格会乔治福克斯的创始人和伊曼纽尔威。

sentences.english: Pennsylvania is also sometimes called The Quaker State.
sentences.chinese: 有时，宾州也被称作“贵格会之州”。

sentences.english: The Pennsylvania Quakers became very prosperous merchants and traders.
sentences.chinese: 宾夕法尼亚的贵格会信徒成了非常兴旺的商人。

definition: The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints
pinyin: Ye1 su1 Ji1 du1 Hou4 qi1 Sheng4 tu2 Jiao4 hui4
related.word: 耶稣基督后期圣徒教会

definition: St Augustine/Aurelius Augustinus (354-430), theologian and Christian philosopher/Sankt Augustin, suburb of Beuel, Bonn, Germany
